label: Things missing in cv/resume (to be added) or to be removed
What would you like us to highlight?
Name skills, personality traits, achievements and reasons you think you should get your next job
Would you be able to quantify some achievements you did (and tell us at which jobs these took place)?
What are your year by year achievements?
How many promotions did you get at each company (please describe in detail)?
What you did for the companies you worked with to provide growth?
Did you get any awards you would like us to mention?
Please elaborate on your concerns with your current resume
What are your biggest concerns with your current resume?
What is the strongest aspect of your current resume?
Provide your writer with some job listings that interest you.
Is there a specific job title you are seeking for your next position?
Are there any obstacles you feel are in the way of securing a new position?
Please provide 2-3 of your proudest achievements or contributions for each of your positions.
Anything else you want to tell your writer?
